about_the_game:
Kabuto Park is a small and cute bug collection game. Upgrade your equipment, catch the best bugs, level them up, choose your team carefully and fight other kids' teams to become the summer beetle battles champion.

Catch cute bugs 🦋✨

Beetles! Butterflies! Bees! Dragonflies! More beetles! Discover all the cool bugs that live in Kabuto Park and try to catch them by timing your net swings right.

Win the tiniest sumo fights 💪🪲

Choose your team depending on their stats, abilities and look and show other kids who is the best beetle battler! Each bug you select for your team will add cards to your deck that you'll be able to use during the little fights to try to push your opponents out of the ring.

Your rhino beetle is not strong enough? Feed it candies to level it up and you'll have better luck winning the next fight!

Buy cool stuff 🔍📗

Better boots or a better net will surely make you the best bug catcher! Lucky for you, the local store has everything you need to get access to new areas with new bugs, make rare bugs appear more often or make capture easier.

Features 🎮

What Kabuto Park offers:

  • 2-3h of playtime

  • Randomized gacha-like bug discovery with a capture mini game

  • Light upgrade system to get access to more bugs and easier capture

  • Bug fights with a simple deck building and card battle gameplay

  • Leveling system to upgrade your favorite critters

  • Childish wonder

  • Summer vibes

  • The cutest bugs

What Kabuto Par does NOT offer:

  • Exploration and moving around in the world

  • Adventure with quests and a long plot

  • Multiplayer of any kind. No PVP, no trading.

  • Spiders. That one is for you arachnophobes.

Dev team 🐛🐞

Doot and Zakku are back for another tiny game ✨

We are the developer and music composer of Minami Lane and Froggy's Battle, still on our quest to bring more tiny cute games to the world! Trained by Minami Lane's artist Blibloop, Doot had to draw everything by himself this time (please don't be mean I'm trying my best).

We really hope you'll enjoy our little game 💖

Prototype Gameplay Music by Heatley Bros

Your rhino beetle is not strong enough? Feed it candies to level it up and you'll have better luck winning the next fight!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4:3 unsupported. If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4:3 unsupported. If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.

name: Kabuto Park

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), 10 or 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4:3 unsupported. If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.

short_description: Welcome to Kabuto Park! Capture the cutest bugs, train them and win the summer beetle battles championship in this little bug collection game! Upgrade your equipment to find rarer, stronger and cuter beetles, butterflies, bees or dragonflies. Will you be able to catch them all?
